titles.title: Hennepin Canal National Heritage Corridor Act
A bill to establish the Hennepin Canal National Heritage Corridor in the State of Illinois, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 4/28/1988--Introduced. Hennepin Canal National Heritage Corridor Act - Establishes the Hennepin Canal National Heritage Corridor in Illinois.
